de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.parser

Class PreferenceHeaderParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.parser.PreferenceHeaderParser

  • public final class PreferenceHeaderParser
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class, which allows to parse instances of the class PreferenceHeader from XML files.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Collection<PreferenceHeader> fromResource(Context context, int resourceId)
      Parses and returns the preference headers, which are defined by a specific XML resource.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • fromResource

        public static java.util.Collection<PreferenceHeader> fromResource(Context context,
                                                                  int resourceId)
        Parses and returns the preference headers, which are defined by a specific XML resource.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used to retrieve the XML resource, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        resourceId - The resource id of the XML file, which should be parsed, as an Integer value. The resource id must correspond to a valid XML resource
        Returns:
        A collection, which contains the preference headers, which have been parsed from the given XML resource, as an instance of the type Collection
